brandGuidance.faction: The Galeborn - followers of Zephyros the storm hawk, creatures of cold wind and frost
brandGuidance.aesthetic: Weathered, cold-adapted, practical gear - bone, iron, leather, fur. Cold blue-gray palette.
brandGuidance.tone: Threatening but NOT demonic. Antagonists, not monsters. They believe they are right.
brandGuidance.style: Pixel art matching player style, face LEFT (opposite to player facing right)

prompt.subject: Galeborn skirmisher - weasel or stoat warrior
prompt.physique: Small, fast predator. Long sinuous body, low to ground, built for quick strikes
prompt.fur: Winter-white stoat or pale weasel, frost-touched appearance, dark eyes
prompt.outfit: Light leather armor with bone toggles, tattered cloak in storm-gray, crude iron dagger or short blade
prompt.expression: Feral cunning, teeth bared, ready to strike and retreat
prompt.animation: Row 1: Idle prowl (2), patrol walk (4), spotted player (2). Row 2: Lunge attack (3), slash (2), recoil (2), death fall (1)
prompt.behavior: Fast attacker, low HP, closes distance quickly, telegraphs lunge
prompt.style: Pixel art, 96x96, facing LEFT, cold blue-gray undertones
prompt.negative: NO demonic features, NO glowing eyes, NO sci-fi elements

prompt.subject: Galeborn shieldbearer - armored badger
prompt.physique: Large, muscular badger, imposing stance, low center of gravity
prompt.fur: Dark gray and white face markings, thick winter coat with frost on guard hairs
prompt.outfit: Heavy banded leather armor with iron studs, large round wooden shield with iron rim, short mace
prompt.equipment: Shield has frost motif painted on front (stylized snowflake or wind spiral)
prompt.animation: Row 1: Shield raised idle (2), slow advance (4). Row 2: Shield bash (3), mace swing (3), stagger from behind hit (2), collapse (2)
prompt.behavior: Slow but blocks frontal attacks. Must be attacked from behind or after parry.
prompt.style: Pixel art, 128x128, facing LEFT, bulky imposing silhouette
prompt.negative: NO fantasy plate armor, NO skulls or demon imagery

prompt.subject: Galeborn slinger - rat warrior with sling
prompt.physique: Medium rat, hunched posture, quick reflexes, long naked tail
prompt.fur: Dark gray-brown fur, lighter underbelly, scarred ears
prompt.outfit: Hooded leather jerkin in muted gray-green, pouch of stones on belt, leather sling
prompt.expression: Calculating, aims carefully, sneer of contempt
prompt.animation: Row 1: Idle scanning (2), sidestep left/right (4). Row 2: Wind up sling (2), release projectile (2), reload (2), hit stagger and fall (2)
prompt.behavior: Keeps distance, telegraphs shot clearly, vulnerable during reload
prompt.projectile: Smooth river stones, NOT magical or glowing
prompt.style: Pixel art, 96x96, facing LEFT, clear attack telegraph
prompt.negative: NO magic projectiles, NO energy attacks

prompt.subject: Galeborn screecher - crow or raven scout
prompt.physique: Large corvid, wings spread for flight, sharp talons, intelligent eyes
prompt.plumage: Glossy black feathers with blue-gray sheen, frost on wing tips
prompt.outfit: Light leather harness with message pouch, no heavy armor (needs to fly)
prompt.expression: Watchful, alert, screams warning when spotting intruders
prompt.animation: Row 1: Hover/flap (4), glide (2). Row 2: Dive attack (3), talon strike (2), hit recoil (2), spiral fall death (1)
prompt.behavior: Flies overhead, dive-bombs player, telegraphs with screech before diving
prompt.style: Pixel art, 112x112, angled 3/4 view for aerial perspective
prompt.negative: NO demonic wings, NO fire or magic

prompt.subject: Cellar serpent - underground ambush enemy
prompt.physique: Large grass snake or adder, coiled body, flicking tongue, not venomous-looking
prompt.scales: Mottled brown and gray for camouflage against dungeon stone, subtle pattern
prompt.expression: Cold, patient, predatory but not evil - just a creature defending territory
prompt.animation: Row 1: Coiled idle (2), rise to strike pose (2), lunge forward (2). Row 2: Bite snap (2), recoil miss (2), slither retreat (2)
prompt.behavior: Hides in shadows or behind stones, lunges when player gets close, retreats after striking
prompt.habitat: Deep Cellars (Chapter 5) - ambushes from dark corners
prompt.style: Pixel art, wide frame for serpent length
prompt.negative: NO fantasy dragon features, NO magical serpent

prompt.subject: Galeborn champion - elite fox warrior (miniboss)
prompt.physique: Tall, powerful arctic fox, lean but muscular, commanding presence
prompt.fur: Pure white winter coat with hints of silver, thick ruff around neck, frost patterns in fur
prompt.outfit: Decorated leather and iron armor with frost motifs, flowing gray-blue cloak, greatsword with leather-wrapped hilt
prompt.expression: Noble contempt, believes in Zephyros's cause, worthy adversary not mindless villain
prompt.animation: Row 1: Commanding stance (2), slow stalk (4), weapon flourish (2). Row 2: Overhead slash (3), horizontal sweep (3), quick thrust (2). Row 3: Block stance (2), stagger from heavy hit (2), knee collapse (2), defeated kneel (2)
prompt.behavior: Miniboss fight. Has 2 phases. Pattern-based attacks with clear tells. Respects strong opponents.
prompt.encounters: Guards key locations - Great Hall entrance, Archives door, etc.
prompt.style: Pixel art, 160x160, regal menace, facing LEFT
prompt.negative: NO demonic armor, NO glowing weapons, NO zombie/undead features

prompt.subject: Zephyros - Final Boss, the Storm Hawk, Lord of the Galeborn
prompt.physique: Massive anthropomorphic hawk/eagle, twice Finn's height, broad wingspan, powerful talons, regal bearing
prompt.plumage: Steel gray feathers with frost-white edges, icy blue around eyes, crown of frost-touched feathers
prompt.outfit: Ceremonial frost-touched armor over chest and shoulders, flowing storm-gray cloak that moves like wind, NO helm (proud visage visible)
prompt.weapon: Massive war-glaive with ice motifs (NOT glowing magic, just cold steel)
prompt.expression: Imperious, genuinely believes bringing eternal winter will 'purify' the world, tragic villain not pure evil
prompt.personality: Speaks of cold as 'peace' and warmth as 'weakness'. Sees Finn as worthy but misguided.
prompt.animation: Row 1: Hovering descent landing (4), regal stance (4). Row 2: Glaive sweep (4), diving strike (4). Row 3: Wing buffet (creates wind), frost breath (cloud of cold, NOT laser), stomp shockwave (4). Row 4: Stagger (2), wounded stance (2), defeat collapse (4)

boss_phases.phase1: Grounded combat - glaive attacks and wing buffets
boss_phases.phase2: Takes flight - diving attacks and frost breath from above
boss_phases.defeat: Falls, frost melts, reveals tragic figure

prompt.arena: Storm-battered outer ramparts, lightning in background, wind and snow
prompt.style: Pixel art, 256x256 frames, VERY large sprite, facing LEFT, imposing but noble
prompt.negative: NO demonic features, NO fire (he's cold/ice themed), NO skeleton/undead, NO laser eyes

prompt.subject: River stone projectile for slinger enemy
prompt.description: Smooth gray river stone, slightly oval, tumbling through air
prompt.style: Pixel art, 32x32, motion blur suggesting spin
prompt.negative: NO magic glow, NO energy effects

prompt.subject: Frost breath particle for Zephyros boss
prompt.description: Swirling cold mist/ice crystal, not a laser beam. Think winter fog with ice sparkles.
prompt.animation: 4 frame dissipation: Dense cloud → spreading → thinning → fade
prompt.negative: NO laser, NO fire, NO energy beam
